landing.heroText: Welcome to Adopteez – a safe community for adoptees and families.

footer.description: A supportive community for adoptees and adoptive parents.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: All adoptees, adoptive parents and interested people are welcome.
faq.q2: Does it cost anything to join?
faq.a2: You can choose between several memberships – see prices and options above.
faq.a3: Yes, we prioritize safety and privacy. You choose what you share.
